messages.title: Putting St Albans first
messages.content: Anne is already well known for standing up strongly for St Albans.

messages.title: She believes in listening to make sure voters' voices heard
messages.content: Anne works 100% for you and for the good of St Albans

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning against the rail freight scheme.
Delivered on her promise for more school places.
Retained vital hospital services and a new urgent care centre.
Campaigned for the protection of our Green Belt and against the rail freight proposal.
Takes action to deliver cleaner air.
Delivered funding for better roads and pavements.

issues.brexitEurope: Anne has stood up for us in the fight against the destruction of the Green Belt, abuse of our immigration system and more EU referendum.
issues.education: Delivered on her promise for more school places.
issues.environment: Campaigned for the protection of our Green Belt.
issues.health: Retained vital hospital services and a new urgent care centre.
issues.immigration: Fought against the abuse of our immigration system.

housing.content: Campaigning against the rail freight scheme to protect local infrastructure.

leaflet.personalStatement: No-nonsense approach, backing residents on a wide range of local issues.

politicalExperience.achievements: Delivering on school places, healthcare, and infrastructure.
